items.preText: Nisar Ahmed: "Tharanga can bat very well and deep but some one need to stick on other end. if wickets on other end keep falling Tharanga will be under pressure and will throw his wicket away."
items.text: clipped off the pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, no run

items.text: turned off the hips to square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: Mendis is struck flush on the helmet. The back flap on the helmet gets detached. What a nasty blow! Good to see Mendis shake it off and laugh it off. Tharanga and Mendis punch gloves. Short, zips off the pitch, and rushes the batsman for pace
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: another bouncer just outside off, Mendis keeps his eyes on the ball and then ducks under
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: short, angling in, 134ks, stabbed back off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, no run

items.text: leg-stump ball, shovelled away fine of short fine leg who is inside the circle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: full and angling into a solid front-foot push to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: good length on off, defended back
items.postText: Don: "Tharanga surely got to be one of the stylish batsmen playing around. His off side game is an absolute treat for eyes. Sad he hardly gets the support he deserves at the top of the order. "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: ...and right after switching the angle to Tharanga, the batsman steps out for a lofted hit over mid-off. He is nowhere close to the pitch of the ball and winds up scooping a catch to Mahmudullah at mid-off
items.postText: Sachith: "RRR almost 7 now. Missed Kusal Perera's big hits. He is in wonderful form after a long break. Also Asela needs to play a good knock here. He didn't perform well in last few matches."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, OUT

dismissal.text: WU Tharanga c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 25 (35b 3x4 0x6) SR: 71.42

items.text: full and sneaks low outside off, Dickwella chases a long way away from the body and nearly chops it back onto the stumps. The ball dribbles past the leg stump to fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 1 run

items.preText: Sachin Senthila: "@Don - Thanks for the Jinx.. He got out the next ball after your comment..."
items.text: full, slower cutter outside off, Mendis checks his push and guides the ball to short cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: tucked off the pads to long leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dickwella, 2 runs

items.text: pitched up on middle, hangs back and plays to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dickwella, no run

items.text: clipped away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: just short of a good length and outside off, Mendis picks up the length early. He swivels on the back foot and pulls to the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, FOUR runs

items.text: Rubel tests him with another short ball outside off, the batsman gets on top of the bounce and pulls it harder but straight to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mendis, 1 run

items.preText: Aznee: "Dickwella must play sensibly rather than taking unnecessary risks. He's got to play a long innings, if things are to turn in Sri Lanka's favor. "
items.text: this cutter is nurdled to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: full and angling into middle, driven to the right of mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: full and outside off, squeezes a drive to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: short and attacking the body, toe-ends a pull to midwicket
items.postText: Easygoing Joe: "It's disappointing how SL has a fairly strong batting line up, but waste it by messing up the order. The other night Mathews was sent in before Chandimal when you expect a guy like Chandi to build the innings whereas you expect Mathews to be able to hit a long ball in the slog overs. Today the danger man Perera gets out and instead of sending Dickwella to smash a few in the powerplay and rattle the bowlers - in comes Mendis who takes his time to almost 're-build' the innings with 1 down!"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: full, wide, offcutter, toe-ended to the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: hip-high short ball on off, swatted firmly to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, 1 run

items.text: nurdled off the pads to fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: slower offcutter outside off right away, toe-ended to the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: jabbed to deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, 1 run
